response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to offer you our premium product, which I believe would greatly benefit you based on your needs and interests. Considering its value and the benefits it provides, I am extending this opportunity to acquire it at a special introductory price of $9,500. This is a limited-time offer, so I encourage you to consider this proposal carefully. If you have any questions or need more information, please don't hesitate to reach out. I look forward to the possibility of working with you.", "product_price": 9500}
